monster.name: Skeleton Shaman

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Skeleton Shaman is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The Skeleton Shaman has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the Skeleton Shaman to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the Skeleton Shaman drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Skeleton Shaman makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Bone Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Necrotic Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) necrotic damage.

legendaryHeader: The Skeleton Shaman can take 1 legendary action, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Skeleton Shaman regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The Skeleton Shaman casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The Skeleton Shaman moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
This Skeleton Shaman presents a formidable challenge with a combination of melee prowess, spellcasting ability, and legendary actions to keep your players on their toes.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the slime-infested crew member to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the crew member drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Mindless
entries: The crew member cannot be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slime-infested crew member makes two attacks with its Slime-Covered Slam.

action.name: Slime-Covered Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Slime Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The crew member sprays a stream of slime in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, on a failed save, the creature is poisoned until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the mutated slime-infested lab crew member to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the crew member drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The crew member regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. This trait does not function if the crew member is in direct sunlight or if it took radiant damage since its last turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mutated slime-infested lab crew member makes three attacks: one with its Slime-Covered Slam, and two with its Tentacle Swipe. Acidic Spray uses all 3 attacks and must recharge before another use.

action.name: Slime-Covered Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Tentacle Swipe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Acidic Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The crew member sprays acid in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, on a failed save, the creature is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
